item.title: Material for R users
item.description: Programming skills are like the Universe: always expanding until proven otherwise. Thatâ€™s why I decided to start compiling useful material for those using R. Doing so not only will help me keep track of where the knowledge is, it may also prove to be helpful to other people. Here it goes: Introductory Material For those just starting with R, my first steps were taken using R for Data Science. This book covers all the basic aspects of R and stimulates the user to navigate further in programming.
